attributes.review: Absolutely horrible took forever to load as soon it loaded it stayed a blank screen. Very disappointed.

attributes.review: This app messed up my phone. It took forever to download, and I’m not talking hours, I’m talking DAYS. It took 5 days to download, only to not work, and mess up my phone. DO NOT GET.

attributes.review: Every time I open the app the old orange man stares at me and I have to go to the bathroom and vomit 🤮. Happens all the time of you don’t want to puke and get sick DONT OPEN THE APP OR GET IT. Very ugly mascot puked more then 11 times 🤮🤮🤮👁👅👁

attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded this app to show my OVERWHELMING SUPPORT for America 🇺🇸 it crashed my entire phone and when the screen came back to life an orange man started shouting obscenities and slurs at me. Do not download!!
